FAQSection.title: Frequently Asked Questions
FAQSection.subtitle: Have questions? We have answers. If you can't find what you're looking for, feel free to contact us.

faqs.question: How accurate are the transcriptions?
faqs.answer: Our transcription accuracy is over 95% for clear audio, thanks to advanced AI models. Accuracy can vary depending on background noise and speaker clarity.

faqs.question: Is there a limit on the length of audio messages?
faqs.answer: We support audio messages up to 10 minutes long. For audios longer than 3 minutes, we also provide a concise AI-generated summary along with the full transcription.

faqs.question: How can I cancel my subscription?
faqs.answer: You can cancel your subscription at any time from your account dashboard. The process is simple and immediate, with no questions asked.

faqs.question: When will Instagram and Telegram be supported?
faqs.answer: We are actively developing integrations for Instagram Direct and Telegram. We expect to launch them in the coming months. All current subscribers will get access automatically.

faqs.question: How is my privacy protected?
faqs.answer: We take data security very seriously. Audio files are processed securely and deleted from our servers immediately after transcription. We do not store your conversations.

faqs.question: What languages are supported for transcription?
faqs.answer: Currently, our service is optimized for Portuguese and English. We are working to add support for more languages in the future.
